Address: Sector 32 Sohna Gurgaon Haryana, Sohna, Gurgaon, Delhi NCR

desc:
A 2BHK + Study independent builder floor for sale in Flower Valley, Flamingo Floor, Sohna Road, Gurgaon.   Note - This is a 123-acre project, which has a huge backyard, & the front yard has boundary walls & lush green surrounding with a variety of flowers.  - The ground floor measures a super built-up area of 1093 Sqft. & carpet area is 644 Sqft. The basement with 873 Sqft. has a carpet area of 674 Sqft. (Total super area comes to 1966 Sqft. & total carpet area is 1318 Sqft.) - The basement is exclusively available with this floor, which has provision for kitchen, bathroom, a provision for sewage disposal. It is suitable for office, clinic, boutique & residential use. Vitrified tiles are used for this property as well as there is a small store in the basement.  - Construction of this property is done with RCC walls, which are pre-fabricated; the whole building is compiled for Zone-IV seismic zone. Property Specifications  This Vaastu compliant flat is placed on the ground floor & encompasses 2 bedrooms with wardrobes, 2 western bathrooms, 1 study room with cupboard, 4 split ACs, 1 living room and 1 modular kitchen. The property has 4 access - 2 in front and 2 to the backyard lawn.  Covered with Anti-skid tiles, the first bathroom is attached to the master-bedroom while the second bathroom is common for another bedroom & living-room. Top-quality Rocca & Jaguar fittings are used in these bathrooms. In addition, there is a counter near the basin. Moreover, vitrified tiles are used in the living room & kitchen whereas the study-room & bedrooms are embellished with wooden flooring. Facilities  One open parking space, power backup, water supply & security guards are available. Notable amenities like clubhouse, gym, children park, walking track, & fountain with restaurants are also provided.   Locality Located on Sector 32 Sohna Gurgaon road NH-248A and Golf course, this property is 1.5km from GD Goenka University and KR Managalam. Many IT parks are found at 4km and various builder floors are nearby. Medanta Hospital is within the reach of 7km as well as within the premises there are commercial stores available. MG Metro station is located at a distance of 12km.  Location highlights  It is 15 minutes from Rajiv Chowk (NH48) via the upcoming elevated corridor on Sohna Road. Educational institutes like GD Goenka, KR Mangalam & many more are already functional in the area. Medanta Hospital & Artemis Hospital are within 10-12 Kms. Famous brands VIZ. Max, Cinepolis, Disney, Splash, Lifestyle, F21 are in the vicinity. Adventure Park & Industrial belt are located nearby.  Lohagarh Farms, Damdama Lake, & Sulphur Springs are nearby. Westin, resorts, Lemon Tree, Country Inn are few hotels & resorts close-by. It has easy connectivity with Golf Course extension road, Kundli-Manesar-Palwal (KMP) corridor, Delhi Mumbai Industrial corridor, Southern peripheral road, developed Sohna Road & Golf Course extension CBD.

This is a relatively new property with construction age less than 5 years and is worthy of your valuable money and time invested. So, grab this opportunity before others do it!!Property SpecificationMeasuring a super area of 1325sqft, this apartment is brilliantly crafted to match various requirements of a family, therefore, owning this property to reside with your loved ones is totally a wise choice. Facing the auspicious east direction, this fabulous 3BHK apartment positioned on the 10th floor is blessed with adequate natural light and a cool breeze. Hence, residents of this apartment can enjoy the serene ambience all along the day.Semi-furnished; this abode encompasses 3 bedrooms, 2 western fashioned bathrooms with geyser connecting points, 4 wide balconies, a spacious living cum dining area, and a modular kitchen fitted with RO water filter. Also, electrical fixtures like lights and fans are fitted so you do not have to spend extra money on fixing the same.Furthermore, one of the bathrooms is commonly connected to 2 of the bedrooms while the other is connected to the 3rd bedroom. You can stay updated with the happenings on the main road from the balconies present in this residence. Of the 4 balconies; 2 are attached to 3 bedrooms, 1 is linked with the kitchen, and the remaining is with the hall.Enhancing the aesthetic appeal of this flat is the flooring immaculately topped up with vitrified tiles across all the rooms. desc:
Live a fairy-tale life with your loved ones in one of the finest localities of Gurgaon, in this well-planned 3BHK Flat up for sale in Ramprastha The Skyz, Sector 37D. Spanning across the super built-up area of 2025 sq ft this flat available in Gurgaon promises you complete customer satisfaction, transparency in dealing, and maximum return on investment.Note: As of now this property is under construction, hence the possession is estimated to be by December 2021. Property SpecificationsRamprastha The Skyz is an 18 storeyed apartment designing this spacious flat on the super built-up area of 2025 sq ft lies on the 5th floor. Up-to-date with the best quality of electrical fans & lights, this Vastu compliant flat available in a semi-furnished condition is bathed with cool breeze & natural sunlight. The layout of this good-looking flat encompasses 3 bedrooms, 5 stylish bathrooms, 5 airy balconies, an air-conditioned living cum dining area, and a kitchen. Appointed with branded air-conditioners, all the bedrooms are groomed-up with the fancy wardrobes that keep the bedrooms organized.Breathe in the fresh air in your lungs in the balconies that overlook the garden. Here, out of 5 balconies, 3 are attached to the bedrooms, one is linked to the hall and the 5th balcony is connected to the kitchen. The modular kitchen is topped-up with a granite countertop, & a stainless steel sink where you can explore the hidden chef in you. The vitrified tiled flooring for this flat compliments the beauty of every inch of the residence. Facilities Ramprastha The Skyz is a gorgeous residential property that favors a plethora of modern amenities & facilities like power back up, lift, rainwater harvesting, clubhouse, swimming pool, gymnasium, park, reserved parking, security, round the clock water supply, water storage, service/goods lift, visitor parking, maintenance staff, waste disposal, jogging and strolling track. LocalityWell-connected via roads and railways, the residents of this apartment can experience direct access to the major parts of the city as public transport is close by. Furthermore, driving for about 10-15 minutes directs you to the airport while the upcoming metro is sited just in front of this property. A good number of schools, colleges, and a few reputed healthcare centers, nursing homes, and clinics are within the surroundings of this property. The upcoming market within the premises,  banks & ATM centers are close by, and this apartment is about 2km away from the Hero Honda Chowk.

K728  DLF  Phase 2, DLF City Phase 2, Gurgaon, Delhi NCR
Landmarks: Walking distance from MG Road metro station. Behind DLF Central Arcade
desc:
A beautiful 4BHK semi furnished duplex builder floor is available for resale in DLF City Plot Phase 2, DLF City Phase 2, Gurgaon. Property SpecificationsThis elegantly designed adobe is spread across a super area of 4300 sq.ft and is perfectly ready to move in. Offering the benefits of freehold style of ownership, this adobe is built over basement and the ground floor receiving plenty of natural light as well as good ventilation. Overlooking the main road, the construction age of this north east facing building is less than 5 years and is relatively a new property.Splendidly configured, the layout of the basement encompasses two bedrooms, a puja room, two bathrooms, gym area, home theater room and a party hall. The ground floor comprises of two bedrooms, a kitchen, dining room, drawing room, three bathrooms and a servant room. The servant room is designed to have a separate entry and a common bathroom fashioned in western style. All the bedrooms are adorned with wardrobe and TV unit. Fashioned in western style the bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms, along with geyser and exhaust fan installed in them. All the rooms in the adobe are well furnished with ACs. Fully equipped Home Theater with Dolby sound is an added benefit to this adobe. The modular kitchen is appointed to include chimney, cooking range, microwave, granite platform and a stainless steel sink. The flooring of the kitchen is gracefully finished with granite tiles, whereas rest of the adobe is finished with stylish marble tiles. Also wooden flooring is nicely done to one of the bedroom. FacilitiesTwo open parking spaces are available to the occupants. The unit is also benefited with uninterrupted supply of water. Security of this complex is highly prioritized with 24/7 manned security services. For any repair works, utility service providers such as electricians and plumbers are easily available.LocalityDLF Central Arcade and MGF Metropolitan Mall are situated within a walkable distance from this tower. Delhi Public School, Sherwood Convent School and American Montessori Public School are some of the prominent schools available within 1km radius. Uma Sanjeevani Health Centre & Hospital, Kirti Ayurvedic Hospital & Research Centre and Sri Sri Ayurveda & Aushadh Panchakarma are some of the well known hospitals available within 10min walkable distance. ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank and Kotak Bank are some of the banking options available within 2km. MG Road metro station and Sikandarpur Metro Station are dotted within a distance of just 5mins by walk. Also commuting from this well established locality is not a problem, as various modes of public transport facilities are easily available.

desc:
Seize this excellent opportunity of becoming the proud owner of a meticulously constructed 2BHK flat in Logix Blossom Greens, Sector 143, Noida. Available for sale and located in one of the most preferred residential neighbourhoods, this apartment with a nice blend of space and quality construction is reasonably priced. Property SpecificationPlaced on the 6th floor of a 16-storey building, this 100% Vaastu compliant flat will surely bring joy and happiness to you and your family members. Aptly designed with spacious rooms and well-planned layout, this apartment will offer a comfortable living space for any small family. Bestowed in the goodness of sunlight all day and ventilation, this lively abode is pleasant to live in. Further, it is beneficial to you as this flat is unfurnished so you can furnish it according to your convenience and taste. Thoughtfully planned, this north-east facing flat comprises 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, a living cum dining, a study room and a kitchen with a cooking platform and a sink. The perfectly finished vitrified flooring, which is easy to maintain and stain-free enhances the visual appearance of this abode.Up-to-date with all the electrical fixtures and curtains, this apartment is a fine place to consider. Both the bathrooms are designed in western-style and provided with all the fittings. One of them is attached and the other one is available for common use. Opening onto the views of the main road (highway) and garden, these airy balconies are connected to both the bedrooms. FacilitiesFor the easy lifestyle of the residents, prime amenities like open/covered parking space, round the clock water supply and 100% power backup are available. Outright security with guards and CCTV surveillance for the safety of your family members is provided too.The society is loaded with few important amenities such as 2 Lifts, Rain Water Harvesting, Club House, Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Park, Reserved Parking, Water Storage, Service/Goods Lift, Visitor Parking, Intercom Facility, Maintenance Staff, Waste Disposal, Conference Room, Piped Gas, Jogging and Strolling Track, and Outdoor Tennis Courts. desc:
Beautifully crafted, this spacious 2 BHK flat is up for sale in one of the premium societies of Lotus Boulevard, Sector 100, Noida. Stretching its boundaries across extensive acres of refreshing greens, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Lotus Boulevard are blessed with sufficient amount of fresh air & natural light which is a reward for an ideal living. Property SpecificationsLoaded with several top-class amenities, Lotus Boulevard is a brilliantly developed housing society where you can experience the bliss of living a lavish and comfortable lifestyle with your dear ones. Spanning across 1398sqft (super area), this well-designed flat has been approved by the Noida Authority and is also benefited with leasehold ownership. Absolutely ready to move in, this fine-looking flat is sited on the 2nd floor in a high-rise building of 22 floors.Being semi-furnished, this flat encompasses 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, a living cum dining room, a study room and a well-organized kitchen. Moreover, this flat is bestowed with ample natural light and cross ventilation that creates a perfect ambiance to live in.Both the well-designed bedrooms are adorned with fancy wardrobes, almirahs, netted windows and doors. Offering beautiful views of the garden, one balcony is attached to the hall and the other is linked with one of the bedrooms.Further, the western fashioned bathroom is attached to one of the bedrooms and another bathroom is commonly available. All these bathrooms are well equipped branded geysers to assure continuous hot water. The kitchen is a modular one and is equipped with a chimney, granite countertop and sink. Moreover, the beauty of this flat is enhanced by the elegant vitrified tiles flooring that is easy to clean and durable whereas classy wooden flooring is used in the bedrooms.FacilitiesThe society is benefited with state-of-the-art amenities like visitor parking space, park, service/goods lift, internet/Wi-Fi connectivity, intercom facility, gymnasium, clubhouse and a lot more.Other basic facilities such as one covered parking space, round the clock water supply, power backup and high-end security are available for this flat.  LocalityWith presence of several world class schools, colleges, hospitals and markets has attracted many home buyers.Connaught Place – one of the prime & happening commercial hub of New Delhi is about half an hour drive away. Besides, easy connectivity to public transports, the locality also offers good connectivity to various prominent areas of Delhi.Book this flat in Lotus Boulevard Sector 100, Noida now and enjoy the joy of living a happy & comfort living with your precious family under the goodness of mother nature.

Also, Huda City Centre metro station of Yellow Line is 20 minutes from here and conveniently connects Sector 50 with Delhi. IGI Airport is well-connected with the sector at 20 km, accessible within 30-40 minutes via Golf Course Road.

desc:
Newly built, this exclusive residential property is up for sale in Nanak Pura - Hari Nagar one of the affluent localities of New Delhi. Worth investing, this property is well-furnished with high-end specifications and includes 4 well-built residential units of 3-BHK configuration.Note - As of now, the entire property is under-construction condition and is readily available for possession in the month of January-2020.Property specificationsReplete with abundant sunlight and excellent cross ventilation, this property is comfortably extended across four spacious floors. Namely upper ground, first, second, and third floors. These floors are interconnected by an extensive external staircase with high-quality granite stones.  Each of these thoughtfully planned floors incorporates 1 unit of 3-BHK configuration which covers 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 balconies, living cum dining room, and modular kitchen. All these rooms are adorned with flawless Italian marble to accentuate the overall visual appeal.Of three bathrooms in each unit, two are en-suite and one is common. Further, these bathrooms are well-designed in western style and are outfitted with fine sanitary wares of the Jaguar brand. Also, geyser points are available here to facilitate easier installation of geysers in the future.The modular kitchens available in each unit are well-furnished with highly-efficient chimney and ample storage cabinets. The layout of these kitchens ensures hassle-free cooking activities. Furthermore, the interior of these units can be easily customizable as per your decor choice.FacilitiesRound the clock water supply and two covered parking slots are some of the basic facilities provided for this property. Also, utility service providers such as electricians and plumbers are easily accessible within this locality to handle any kind of repair and maintenance issues. LocalityThe excellent availability of public transport facilities around this property makes commuting to various prominent locations in the city much easier and convenient. Furthermore, the nearest metro station is accessible at a distance of 2.5km from this place - an added advantage.Several noted schools and colleges are available within the close vicinity of 1km, while many well-equipped hospitals are easily reachable within the close proximity of 1km. Also, a few of the renowned shopping malls and banks/ATMs are available in the range of 500m to 3km.Seize this investment opportunity at the earliest. You can also rent out each unit and earn handsome income on a regular basis. Hurry up!!!

desc:
Magnificently constructed by skilled engineers & artisans, this enthralling 3BHK flat up for sale is spaciously planned to replete unmatched privacy and comfort. So, if you are seeking a lavish residence for your family in a royal society named Capital Apartment in Vasundhara Enclave, New Delhi, then this property is truly worth consideration...!Property SpecificationsWith its most auspicious east direction, this alluring flat is approved by RWA/Co-operative Housing Society and comes with freehold ownership right thus is definitely a secure & lucrative investment deal to go with.Well-positioned on the 5th floor of the 7-storeyed building, this flat is aged between 15 to 20 years and is completely ready to move in with your much-adored family. desc:
Absolutely ready to move in with your treasured family, is this spacious and brilliantly built 5BHK apartment situated near Ashoka Park Road, Near Abu Bakr Masjid, Zakir Nagar West Gaddha Colony.  Easy access to basic facilities, and secured neighbourhood are the major highlights of this residential property. So, hurry up!! Property Specifications  This apartment faces a south-west direction and is sprawled across a super-built-up area of 1800 sqft. It encompasses 5 roomy bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, modular kitchen and a living room. Along with this, there is an additional room connected to the corridor and the kitchen (presently, the owner is using this room as a balcony). All the bedrooms of this apartment are bedecked with beds (placed in perpendicular direction), side tables, and other essential furniture. Out of 5 bathrooms, 2 bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms. Furthermore, 3 bathrooms are styled in western manner whereas the other 2 bathrooms are Indian fashioned. Also, geysers are installed in each bathroom to ensure instant supply of hot water.  The living room of this apartment has a cupboard where a TV can be installed if required. The modular kitchen is well-designed and comes with a gas pipeline. Also, there is a provision to install a chimney in the kitchen. Furthermore, premium-quality electrical fixtures are fitted throughout this apartment. Besides, the flooring of this apartment is covered with tiles.  Facilities  Investing in this property is indeed a smart decision, as all prime facilities like power backup, 2 covered car parking and 2 covered two-wheeler parking spaces are favoured for this property.  Locality  This commercial property is situated in a secured area close to police chowki. Also, the RWA is very active in this area.  Bahai Lotus Temple, ISKCON Temple Delhi, and Kalkaji Mandir are considered as the major landmarks for this property, as they are approximately 3Km to 4Km away. The Suryaa New Delhi, Fraser Suites New Delhi, The Residency Hotel, Savoy Suites and Radisson Blu Hotel are the popular hotels located within the range of 1Km to 6Km.  Further, around 5Km away from this property, Hazrat Nizamuddin Railway Station, Govindpuri Metro Station Gate No 2, New Ashok Nagar Metro Station-Gate No 2, and Kailash Colony Metro Station Gate No-1 are available.  Shopping zones such as Lajpat Nagar Central Market, and C Block Market-New Friends Colony are around 2Km to 4Km away. Various healthcare centres such as Escorts Heart Institute, Holy Family Hospital, and Fortis Escorts Heart Institute are nearly 1Km away. Some recreational activities include MCD Park-C Block, New Friends Colony, and Kalindi Kunj, which are situated within a distance of 5Km.  A few banking hubs like State Bank of India, HDFC, IDFC, Axis, LIC, and Indusind Bank are just 5Km away. Besides these, Informal By Imperfecto (13km), Kasturba Balika Vidyalaya (2Km) and National Science Museum (9Km) can be easily accessible.

desc:

desc:
This spacious Builder Floor Apartment is located at 1st floor in a tower of total 5 floors.Vikaspuri Block J is a residential locality which is located along the Vikaspuri Flyover and Outer Ring Road in West Delhi. The development is primarily in the form of low-rise LIG, MIG, and HIG apartments developed in the form of Delhi Development Authority (DDA) Flats in 1980s. The sub locality is surrounded by Block GG 1, GG 2, JG 1, and Anand Kunj and Manohar Nagar of Vikaspuri, along with Krishna Park Extension and Tilak Nagar. The block is surrounded by a lot of green patches, including Cricket Ground and a District Park.Vikaspuri Block J is connected to other parts of Delhi with Outer Ring Road, Vikaspuri Marg, Vikaspuri Banks Road, Guru Virjanand Marg and Vardaman Market Road of Vikaspuri. The block is also served by two lines of the Delhi Metro. While Janakpuri West Metro Station, which acts as an intersection between Blue and Magenta Line, is 2 km from the sub-locality, Janakpuri West Metro Station is 3 km away. New Delhi Railway Station is 22 km from the sub-locality, and T1 and T3 terminals of IGI Airport are 16 and 21 km and takes about an hour to reach."The nearest job hub to Vikaspuri Block J is the District Centre of Janakpuri, which is a hub of commercial activities in the region and is around 3 km from the sub-locality. One can commute to the employment hub of Connaught Place (CP), Noida and Gurgaon through metro through Blue and Magenta Line of the Delhi Metro. The locality has a developed local market, which hubs branches of banks like the Bank of India, ICICI Bank and Punjab National Bank.Source  Magicbricks Research"

desc:
Truly gorgeous and studded with attractive interiors, here is the most fabulous 3BHK builder floor available for sale and is located in one of the friendly societies named as Himgiri Apartment in Kalkaji Extention, New Delhi. Hurry up and grab this great opportunity of buying this property…!Property SpecificationsApproved by RWA/Co-operative Housing Society, this adorable builder floor comes with freehold ownership right and is sprawled across 2300sqft of a super area & 2100sqft of a carpet area.With its most auspicious east direction, this ready to move in builder floor is aged less than 5 years and is ideally positioned on the 1st floor of the 2-storeyed building.Skillfully designed to match the living needs of the family, this furnished builder floor encompasses 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, balconies on three sides for complete ventilation, a hall with a 7 seater sofa set & AC, a lobby with 2 ACs and a well-configured kitchen. All the bedrooms are well-furnished with trendy wardrobes, 3 ACs and 3 double beds. The bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms of which, 1 is fashioned in western theme and the other is designed in an Indian style. Overlooking the patch of greenery (garden), 1 balcony is connected to one of the bedrooms, 2nd balcony is aligned with the hall and the 3rd balcony is utility area linked with the kitchen. The kitchen is adorned with the sleek platform, sink, cabinets and chimney that drives away the strong fumes & odour. Further, 1 bedroom is decked with wooden flooring whereas the rest of the rooms are embellished with the ceramic tiles flooring. FacilitiesOne open parking space is available for this residence to accommodate your vehicles comfortably. Round the clock water supply, garden and 100% power backup facilities are provided here. A security guard is appointed and CCTV cameras are installed in this society.LocalityMany prominent schools can be availed within a walkable distance from this builder floor. Within 5mins drive, you can access many reputed hospitals for any medical aid. The local market is available within 2 to 3mins walking distance to buy your daily needs. Plenty of well-known banks and ATMs are found nearby to meet your banking services. Several means of transportation like autos, buses & taxis within the proximity of this residential property.

The rooms being comfortable are thoughtfully furnished and designed with decent interiors. Moving on to the furnishing details of this apartment, the bedrooms consist of wardrobes and double beds. Two of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms while the 3rd bathroom is common to the apartment. All of the bedrooms are modern style and well-accessorized with all the sanitary wares and fittings. Sleekly designed to provide you with modern cooking, the modular kitchen with cabinets, chimney, RO water system, sink unit and provision for pipe gas connection is just lovely. The living is tucked in with a TV unit and sofa set where you can socialize and spend time with family and friends. The master bedroom with wooden flooring and other rooms with marble flooring adds on to the aesthetics of this apartment. desc:
Spacious 3BHK flat of 1230 sqft area is up for sale located in Sainik Colony, Sector 49, Faridabad, Delhi NCR. This property with construction age less than 5 years, is situated near Achivers Mall.  Property SpecificationsThis south east property is situated on the second floor of a two storey building, covering living room, kitchen, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and two balconies. The kitchen unit is modular with granite counterpart, stainless steel sink and storage cabinets. Chimney is also installed in this kitchen. There are three bedrooms furnished with wardrobes and two bathrooms where one is attached and one is common. Both the bathrooms are fashioned in western style. There are two balconies that are attached to the two bedrooms and overlook the main road and other building. The living room and both of the bedrooms are decorated with trendy designed false ceiling along with LED lights as well as provision for AC. The electric fixtures such as lights and fans are installed in the whole flat. High end vitrified tiles are used for flooring of this flat. This property is vaaastu complaint and receives ample of natural light and fresh air throughout the day.  FacilitiesRound the clock water supply and electricity is offered for this building. 100% power backup facility is also offered. Electricians and plumbers are easily available for any kind of repair work. The safety of inhabitants is ensured security guards along with CCTV cameras. There is provision for Video Intercom facility as a part of security system. Covered parking slot is available for one vehicle in the basement.  LocalitySainik Chowk Bus Stop is located close to this building. Metro Train Depot Ajronda is located at a distance of 5.3km. Faridabad Railway Station is located at a distance of 7.1km from this building.For medical assistance, Aster Eye Hospital, ESI Hospital, Santosh Hospital, Royal Multi Speciality Hospital and Fortis Hospital are available within the vicinity of 4.9km. Jiva Public School, Ryan International School, Apeejay Svran Global School, St Columbus Convent School and Kendriya Vidyalaya No 1 are available within the radius of 4.7km from this building. HDFC Bank ATM, ICICI Bank ATM, Punjab National Bank ATM, Axis Bank ATM and Allahabad Bank ATM are accessible within the range of 1km for banking services. Aggarwal Funcity Mall and Vishal Mega Mart are located within the perimeter of 4.8km from this building. Achievers Centre Point Mall is located close to this building.  Public transport such as autos and cabs are easily available from this area.

desc:
Home seekers; get ready to seize this golden chance of owning a magnificent 3BHK apartment that is up for sale in Pan Oasis, Sector 71, Noida. Benefitted with modern amenities, this apartment perfectly matches the requirements of a medium family. So, without any further delay hurry up to make the most of this opportunity.Property SpecificationThoughtfully designed, this 3BHK apartment with the construction age less than 5 years is in a pristine state and is definitely worth investing every penny of your valuable money.Situated on the 16th floor, this apartment enjoys abundant flow of sunlight and fresh air all through the day hence residents can experience the refreshing ambience while at home.This abode spanning across an area of 1839sqft (super area) encompasses 3 well-designed bedrooms adorned with wardrobes, 4 chic bathrooms, 4 wide balconies, living cum dining room, study room and a sleek modular kitchen.Designed in western fashion are the bathrooms of this house among which 3 are attached to the bedrooms while the remaining is en-suite with the study room. Overlooking the park and the pool, the balconies of this apartment add additional space to relax after a long and hectic daily schedule. Moreover, 3 of the bathrooms are connected with the bedrooms while the rest is linked with the kitchen.The lady of your house will surely be impressed with the contemporarily designed kitchen of this flat that is well-appointed with a fine-looking countertop, a sink, spacious cabinets and a chimney. Further, the elegance of this abode is uplifted with classy wooden flooring finished in 2 of the bedrooms whereas ceramic tiles are covered on the flooring in rest of the house. desc:
Promising ultra-luxurious lifestyle, this artistically crafted 3BHK residential flat is up for sale in the prestigious society apartment ?Jal Vayu Vihar? in the prime locality of Sector 21- Noida. Worth buying, this residential property beautiful interiors, modern amenities, and strategic location. So, hurry up and seize this excellent opportunity of owning this flat at the earliest.Property specificationsSited on the 6th floor, this residential flat encompasses 3 elegant bedrooms, 2 well-designed bathrooms, 2 sizeable balconies, attractive living cum dining room, and chic modular kitchen. The well-planned layout ensures a proper inflow of sufficient natural light and good cross ventilation throughout the day, thereby keeps the indoor atmosphere refreshing and pleasant.All three bedrooms are perfect for relaxation and include wardrobes and double beds. Further, these bedrooms are outfitted with the ACs - an added advantage. The bathrooms are designed in western style along with geysers and have been attached to two bedrooms. Further, these bathrooms can also be accessed from the living room with the help of interconnecting doors.The modular kitchen ensures better utilization of the available space and is well-equipped with a large granite platform, stainless steel sink, chimney, and lots of storage cabinets. Furthermore, among two balconies, one is connected to a bedroom while another is linked with the passage. Both these balconies provide an unblocked view of the main road and surrounding greenery.Coming to the flooring, the presence of high-quality vitrified tiles across the flat accentuate the overall look further. The basic facilities such as 24-hour water supply and open parking slots for 2 cars have been provided. Moreover, benefited with freehold ownership rights, this residential flat is the perfect option for experiencing an ultra-luxurious lifestyle along with your family.  FacilitiesApart from the basic facilities, the society building also provides the benefits of modern amenities such as round the clock CCTV surveillance, power backup for common area and lift, maintenance staff, kids club, kids play area, flower garden, rainwater harvesting, water storage, waste disposal, fire fighting equipment, clubhouse, as well as jogging and cycling track. LocalityFor quality education, reputed schools like Sunriseville School and Indian National Public School are located close by, whereas Bal Bharati Public School is located within the society?s compound. The Corporation Bank, HDFC Bank, and Axis Bank are nearby for banking services. Further, Spice World Mall is hardly 1km away from this site for shopping and entertainment.For quick medical support, noted Metro Hospital and Heart Institute and ICARE Eye Hospital are close by, while Kailash Hospital and Apollo Hospital are about 1km away. Furthermore, Noida Sector 15 Metro Station can be found within a 1.5km distance.

desc:
An exquisitely designed 4BHK apartment is available for sale in Omaxe Royal Residency, Sector 44, Noida. This property benefited with an array of modern amenities is without a doubt a perfect destination to settle down with your loved ones and lead a delightful life. So, hurry up and grab this deal!!!Property SpecificationBrilliantly designed with respect to the Vaastu norms; this 4BHK flat promises its residents a life filled with positivity and serenity. Hence; considering this property to dwell with your much-adored family is certainly a wise decision.Nestled on the 6th floor, this flat is inclusive of 4 bedrooms facilitated with almirahs, 4 bathrooms, 7 balconies, a generously sized living cum dining room, and a modular kitchen fitted with a chimney. The flat is up to date with electrical fixtures like lights and fans so you need not worry about fixing the same.Furthermore; among the 4 bathrooms of this abode; 3 are western fashioned while the remaining is Indian style. Branded geysers are installed in two of the bathrooms for uninterrupted supply of hot water. However; 2 bathrooms are ensuite with the bedrooms while the other is common and the 4th bathroom is attached to the servant’s room.Offering you the spectacular views of the garden/park and the pool; the well-proportioned balconies are ideal to relax. Among the 7 balconies present here 4 are connected with the bedrooms, one is with the dining area, one is linked with the drawing-room, and the rest is with the kitchen.To give this abode an elegant look; wooden flooring is done in all the bedrooms and the rest of the flat has vitrified tile flooring. FacilitiesVehicles can be parked at ease as one covered and one open parking spaces are allotted for the same. The property is also favoured with facilities like 24hours water supply and power backup. Security guards are appointed to ensure the safety of residents and other amenities like lift, clubhouse, gymnasium, park, reserved parking, water storage, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, waste disposal, laundry service, internet/Wi-Fi connectivity, DTH television facility, jogging and strolling track, etc are provided.LocalityThe market is only 1km away from this property hence residents here can easily find things required on a daily basis. The prestigious Amity International is close by and hospitals like Kailash and Jaypee can be found at proximity.Residents can travel effortlessly as buses, autos, etc are widely available and the Botanical Garden, Sector 94 Metro Station are at 1-1.5km radius.

desc:
Truly appealing and studded with top-notch amenities, here is the most splendid 3BHK flat up for sale and is located in one of the high-end societies named as DLF Regal Gardens in Sector 90, Gurgaon. Without any further delay, seize this property immediately to enjoy the bliss of living a lavish & plush life forever…!!!Property specificationsPresenting you with the pristine ambience & hustle-bustle free lifestyle, this south facing flat is aged less than 5 years and comes with freehold ownership thus is truly a safe & lucrative investment deal to proceed.Approved by the Haryana Urban Development Authority, this vaastu compliant flat is ideally positioned on the 10th floor of the 29-storey tower and is spanned across 1740sqft of super area.Meticulously designed to match the living needs of the family, this semi-furnished flat comprises 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 3 balconies, a living cum dining area and a modular kitchen.All the bedrooms are furnished with trendy wardrobes to offer you enough convenient storage space. Fashioned in western style & outfitted with top brand geysers, 2 bathrooms are attached and the 3rd bathroom is common.Overlooking the amazing views of the surrounding area, 2 balconies are connected to two of the bedrooms and the 3rd balcony is aligned with the living cum dining area.                Further, the kitchen is adorned with the sleek platform, sink unit and chimney that drives away the strong fumes & odour. Furthermore, all the bedrooms are decked with wooden flooring and the rest of the rooms are embellished with the flooring of marble tiles.     FacilitiesSome of the key amenities like a visitor, covered & reserved parking, kids play area, swimming pool, outdoor tennis courts, gymnasium, multipurpose hall & courts, mini cinema theatre, flower gardens, meditation area and club house are available in this royal society.  The basic facilities such as rainwater harvesting, round the clock, 100% power backup, intercom facility, lift, fire fighting equipment, maintenance staff, CCTV cameras and 24x7 tight security are provided here.LocalityYou can access the upcoming Sapphire Mall within the shortest distance to accomplish your shopping needs. The leading Pranavananda International School and Bharat Ram Global School are found nearby this flat. The famous Aarvy Healthcare and Fortune Hospital are accessible close by for any medical assistance.Many recognized banks and ATMs are available within a short radius to meet your monetary services. Commuting is also not an issue, as you can access the IFFCO Chowk Metro Station at a distance of 20km and different public transports like taxis, buses & autos within the vicinity.

desc:
Are you looking for a vaastu compliant flat in a well established area? If yes, then your wait is over, as this beautiful 3BHK flat located in Officer City, Rajnagar Extension, Ghaziabad is worth buying.Property SpecificationsSituated on the 8th floor this east facing flat comprises of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 3 balconies. Among the two bathrooms, one is attached while the other one is common; both the bathrooms are stylish with western sanitary fittings. All the three balconies are connected to the bedrooms where you can spend your free time, enjoying the pleasant view of park, main road and surrounding area.For efficient cooking, the flat is impressive with a modular kitchen fitted with a granite slab, sink, cabinets and chimney as well which is an added advantage. Long lasting and high quality Ceramic tiles have been used for the flooring of this flat. This property with freehold ownership is surely a great opportunity for investment. FacilitiesTo ensure a luxurious lifestyle, this society is adorned with amenities such as meditation area, golf course, cycling & jogging track, rain water harvesting, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, indoor squash & badminton courts, banquet hall, outdoor tennis courts, event space & amphitheatre, kids club and club house.Other basic facilities like one covered parking space, visitor parking, power backup, intercom facility, lift, fire fighting equipment and round the clock water supply are available. To assure complete safety and security for the residents, security guards are present throughout the day along with CCTV surveillance. In case of any kinds of repairs to be fixed, electricians and plumbers are quickly available.LocalityAs Rajnagar Extension is a well developed area, it enjoys great approach to neighbouring areas with the help of various modes of public transport. Moreover, you can find the upcoming metro station at a distance of just 3.5km from this area.Few reputed educational institutions such as Happy Fun Play School, GD Goenka Public School and M L Public School are situated within close proximity from this place. For better medical facilities, one can access to Health Point Multispeciality Polyclinic and Apex Healthcare & Research Centre which are present within the vicinity.For any financial transactions, you can find Axis Bank ATM, Syndicate Bank ATM, RBL Bank ATM and HDFC Bank ATM within short distance from this area.

desc:
Up for sale is a bright and spacious 4 BHK residential house located in Sector 23, Gurgaon. Offering easy connectivity to major prominent areas, this abode is absolutely apt for experiencing a comfortable life with your beloved ones. Property SpecificationsThis residential house is proficiently crafted according to vaastu principles for bestowing your lives with abundance of peace and prosperity. Spanning across an area of 2400 sq ft, this house spans over basement, ground floor and 1st floor which are interconnected through an external staircase. The basement floor features a huge open hall which can be used for official purpose. The ground floor comprises of 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 well designed bathrooms, well ventilated living cum dining room, well configured kitchen and store room. Two among these bedrooms feature western fashioned attached bathrooms, while the Indian fashioned bathroom is available for common use. The kitchen is meticulously designed and equipped with granite countertop and sink. The 1st floor features servant room along with a western style attached bathroom. Furthermore, fully equipped kitchen, a perfectly aligned balcony and a beautiful open terrace are also available on the 1st floor. The entire abode is decked with stunning marble flooring which lends a classy and elegant visual appeal to this unit. The prospective occupants can avail complete advantage of customizing their dream home according to their choice of interior decors, grab this excellent opportunity now. Facilities The fundamental amenities provided by this house are 2 open parking slots, adequate water supply facility, 24 hours security assurance and substantial power backup facility along with an inverter. Locality This locale offers close proximity to Palam Vihar and Sector 23 market. Reliance Fresh, Easyday Club, Baani Center Point - NH8 and daily needs shops are located within 1 to 2kms. Rotary Public School, Swiss Cottage School and School of Rock are situated within the range of 1 to 8kms. Flourish Medicos, Columbia Asia Hospital Palam Vihar and Dental Solution are located within 1.8kms radius. Address: Noida Extension, Noida, Delhi NCR
desc:
Are you planning to purchase an apartment in the serene locales of Noida? Well, here is a fabulous opportunity for you. A well-designed 3BHK flat is up for sale in Supertech Eco Village, Greater Noida West. This property assures the potential buyer of making a secured investment of the hard earned money. So, don’t let go of this chance.Property SpecificationSprawling across a super built-up area of 1267sqft, this remarkable 3BHK flat is apt for a medium family to settle down blissfully.  Situated on the top floor of a 20-storey building, the flat is blessed with sufficient natural light and fresh air all through the day.The configuration of this flat comprises 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 western mode bathrooms, 2 balconies, living cum dining room and a kitchen with a polished platform and sink. Moving to the bathrooms, one of them is attached to a bedroom while the other is commonly accessible. However, both bathrooms are equipped with geysers for hot water conveniences. All the bedrooms of this flat provide adequate space to de-stress yourself at the end of a tiring day. Additionally, all 2 bedrooms independently open to well-aligned balconies where you can rest and stay updated with the happenings on the main road.The charm of this vaastu compliant flat is further enriched by the vitrified tile flooring impeccably covered across all the rooms and will surely impress you and your guest.FacilitiesThis flat is favoured with round the clock water supply facility so residents will not face any scarcity of water. Also, covered parking space is available to place vehicles at ease. Other modern facilities include- visitor parking, park, rain water harvesting, bar/lounge, gymnasium, kids play area, bank & ATM, activity deck4, air conditioned, kids club, piped gas, lift, power backup, security and clubhouse.LocalityThis flat is hardly 100m away from the shopping mall, supermarket and local market whereas schools, hospitals, banks and ATMs lie within the close periphery. Several reputed schools are present in the close vicinity whereas Fortis Hospital is located at a distance 4-5km from this locality. Commuters can be relaxed as the local bus stop is within the vicinity and also various public transport services are frequently available to and from this locality. The upcoming Kisan Chowk Metro Station is dotted at 3km from this area.

desc:
Your search for a lavishly constructed gorgeous home will now come to an end!!! This premium 2 BHK flat is up for sale in Greater Noida West, Noida. Property SpecificationsBeautifully designed rooms, good quality fittings and flooring used, make this residence a perfect home for comfortable living. Built in accordance with vaastu principles, this premium 2 BHK flat is situated on the 9th floor in a building of 14floors. Truly elegant with fancy lights and appointed with fans, this stunning flat incorporates 2 classy bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 well-aligned balconies, spacious dining cum living room, well-appointed store room and a sleek kitchen.All the bedrooms are finely decked with trendy wardrobes to place your valuables. Appointed with branded geysers, all the bathrooms are of western style, of which 2 are attached to the bedrooms while the other is common. Offering unmatched views of the main road are the 2 well-aligned balconies that are connected to the bedrooms. The sleek and stunning modular kitchen comes with chimney, cabinets, granite cooking top and sink unit. Fine looking ceramic tiles are used to enhance the beauty of this flat.FacilitiesOne covered parking slot is available for placing your vehicle comfortably. This residential complex is well-facilitated with water supply, generator is given as a power backup and CCTV cameras are installed to safeguard this property.LocalityThis well-planned residential apartment is situated in one of the prime locales of Noida and is close to all the local bus stops, AC buses and other public transport facilities. Few of the upcoming DPS schools are situated within 3km, while one of the DPS Schools is at a distance of 14km. Yatharth Hospital and some of the local clinics are easily available within the walking distance from this premise. Leading shopping malls, supermarkets and the local markets are reachable within 6km radius. One of the banks ATM is within the society, while the other nationalised and private banks are situated close by this residential premise.

desc:
Are you searching for a flat to buy and get settled with your beloved family??? Then your search ends now. Here is the most astounding 2 BHK flat is up for sale and is located in one of the prime locales of Sahibabad, Ghaziabad. So, hurry up and grab this flat as soon as possible to lead a comfortable lifestyle.Property Specifications:Spanning across 1300sqft of a super area and 1170sqft of a carpet area, this graceful flat faces towards the south-east direction and is built in accordance with vaastu rules which adds more value to this property. Relatively newly constructed, this flat is situated on the 3rd floor of the 8-floors building and is benefited with a good amount of natural light and refreshing ambience throughout the day thus you can make less use of electricity.Aptly designed and planned to match the living needs of the family, this semi-furnished flat consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, 1 storeroom, a dining room, a living room and a well-configured kitchen.Both the bedrooms are decorated with chic wardrobes to keep your clothes and belongings safely. Among the 2 western-style bathrooms, 1 is attached to one of the bedrooms while the other is common. Additionally, one of these bathrooms is outfitted with geyser for continuous hot water supply. Overlooking the main road, 1 balcony is connected to one of the bedrooms while the other is the living room where you can spend some memorable time with your near & dear ones. Also, the storeroom is attached to the dining room where you can store your excess & unused materials.Further, the modular kitchen is adorned with the shiny countertop, sink unit, cabinets and chimney to offer you comfortable cooking space. Moreover, all the rooms of this flat are bedecked with the most spectacular vitrified tiles flooring that is easy to maintain clean. Facilities:The clubhouse is available for this building to arrange any meetings, parties, functions, etc. An open parking space is available to place your vehicles systematically. Continuous water supply for 24 hours and generator for power backup are provided in this flat. A security guard and CCTV cameras have been installed in this building to safeguard it for 24/7.Locality:Within 10mins drive, you can access many shopping malls, super & local market to buy your daily needs. The leading DLF Public School, Khaitan Public School and D.A.V Public School are found within a radius of 1km. Many notable hospitals & clinics are accessible within 4km for any medical issues. For travelling to other places, you can avail the Rajbagh Metro Station, local bus stop and various public transportation within 2mins walkable distance from this building. Within 5mins walk, the major banks & ATM centers are found within the close proximity.

Address: Central Park 3, Flower Valley  Sohna Road Sector 33, Sector 33 Sohna, Gurgaon, Delhi NCR
Landmarks: Central Park 3,Flower Valley  Sohna Road Sector 33
desc:
Done up with top-class building materials, appealing infrastructure and appealing design, this 2BHK builder floor is for sale. Located in one of the desirable residential neighbourhoods of Sector 33 Sohna, Gurgaon, this abode is perched proximate to the Central Park 3 and Flower Valley Sohna Road Sector 33. Property SpecificationsFeaturing smartly planned layout, this abode comprises 2 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, 3 balconies, a study room, a living cum dining and modular kitchen with cabinets. Advantageously placed on the 1st floor, this condo is ideal for any small family. Moreover, this builder floor is semi-furnished and can be further customized as per our needs. Also, this abode is drenched in ample sunlight and fresh air, keeping the home ambience pleasant. The bedrooms are sure to offer you a good night’s sleep and they come with commodious wardrobes and ACs. Equipped with all the essential sanitary wares, both the bathrooms are well-sized and are of western style. Enhance your cooking skills in the thoughtfully set up kitchen offering a nice cooking space.  The entire builder floor is beautified with good quality ceramic tiles which are also easy to maintain and looks appealing too whereas the bedrooms have wooden flooring. Overlooking the open view are the lovely balconies which are connected to the kitchen and 2 bedrooms. FacilitiesPerforming your daily chores at home will be absolutely easy as an adequate supply of water for 24hours and power backup are provided to this builder floor. desc:
Under construction, this 3 BHK flat  is up for sale in “ATS Le Grandiose” Sector 150, Noida. This residency is one of the grand projects in Noida and an ideal destination for the potential buyers who wants to lead a lavish and amazing lifestyle. Note - The possession of the flat will be given from June-2020Property SpecificationsWell ventilated – this premium flat is positioned on the 23rd floor in the high rise building of 26 floors and is 100% vaastu compliant, thus promising its residents a healthy and prosperous life. Moreover, this astonishingly crafted 3 BHK flat features 3  spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a dining cum living room, 4 balconies, and a modular kitchen. Additionally, for the convenience of  residents,  the entire flat is up-to-date with all essential electrical fixtures.Furthermore, of the 3 well-designed bathrooms, 2 bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms, while the other bathroom is common. Moreover, all the bathrooms are outfitted with western sanitary wares and are fixed with geyser points for further installation.Offering an unmatched view of the pool and golf court, 3 balconies are aligned to bedrooms and 1 balcony is connected to the living room; all balconies are ideal to have a cup of coffee/tea in the morning or evening time with your beloved ones. The kitchen of this flat is brilliantly configured and  is well-appointed with a shiny countertop, a sink and storage cabinets. Keeping easy maintenance and durability in view; the flooring is uplifted with trendy vitrified tiles.FacilitiesThe “ATS Le Grandiose” is benefited with amenities such as cafeteria/food court, visitor parking, meditation area, jogging & strolling track, rainwater harvesting, cycling & jogging track, water storage, service/goods lift, gym, kids play area, indoor squash & badminton courts, banquet hall, activity deck, DTH television facility, swimming pool, outdoor tennis courts, private terrace/garden, park, aerobics room, lift, fire fighting equipment, and a clubhouse.Key facilities like one open/ covered parking space, constant water supply, 100% power backup, and security guard are also provided.LocalityThis residency is sited in one of the fast-growing locales of Noida and has all the modes of public transport within the vicinity, whereas you can also find the Sector 150 Metro Station within the radius of 1-1.5 km while the Anand Vihar Railway Station is located at a distance of 30km from this locality.Even schools like RPS International and many other prominent schools are dotted within the 5.1 km.  Yatharth Super Speciality Hospital lies within just 6kms. For all your daily needs and other necessities, you can find several shops within the same complex. Established in one of the premium sectors of Dwarka that is home to one of the best social infrastructures, this property is worth investing in. That's right! Located in Beverly Park Apartments, Sector 22 Dwarka, New Delhi is a 3 BHK flat of 1600 sq ft super area that is up for sale.Complemented with a beneficial location, this property is tastefully crafted with modern features, airy rooms and also has a basket full of amenities to keep you engaged. So why the wait...cash in and book it soon!Property specificationsLocated on the 3rd floor of a 8 storey building, this abode is semi furnished with fans and lights available, cutting down your setting up work a little before moving in. The flat comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, an L-shaped living cum dining area and a semi modular kitchen.All the 3 bedrooms are complemented with wardrobes and as for the 2 western mannered bathrooms that are available with geysers, 1 is attached while the other is commonly used. Out of the 2 balconies provided that allow ample natural light and fresh air to enter, 1 is commonly connected between 2 bedrooms and the other attached to the drawing room.This abode is adorned with marble tiles as its flooring which builds up the value and look of your abode. Furthermore, built as per vastu norms, this flat is bound to offer your family a positive and potential living environment.FacilitiesThere's a sizable open parking space available and other facilities like 24 hours water supply, 100% power backup and security have also been provided. You have modern amenities like lift, water storage, visitor & reserved parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, waste disposal, laundry service, internet/wi-fi connectivity, DTH television facility, RO water system and piped gas.For an active and productive time, amenities like clubhouse, gymnasium, park, banquet hall, cafeteria/food court, conference room, jogging and strolling track are also available. Moreover, this project has also been awarded Dwarka’s best society that's fully equipped with billiards, table tennis and the provision of sauna and jacuzzi as well.LocalityWithin a 500m distance from the property, you will find the Mount Carmel school while other schools are available within a 2km range. Chintels Paradiso is a ten-storeyed apartment blanketed with an amazingly cool environment situated about 3 minutes from Dwarka Expressway. South-west facing this flat spanning across the super built-up area of 1785 sq ft comprises 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 3 balconies, a living cum dining area, and a kitchen. desc:
A newly constructed ready-to-move-in 4BHK flat is up for sale housed in the wonderfully crafted residential society of "DLF New Town Heights 3" located Sector 91, Gurgaon. This spacious flat is situated on the 9th floor and faces the most preferred with east direction, making it worth considering. Property SpecificationsWell-planned with capacious rooms, this flat is ideal for someone looking for a peaceful, comfortable and exquisite lifestyle. This exclusive flat is configured to hold four well-proportioned bedrooms, four spacious deigned bathrooms, four lovely balconies, a generously sized living/drawing room and an attractive kitchen with normal granite platform and in-built sink. All the four bathrooms are western fashioned, of which three are attached to the bedroom while one is common. Moreover, the master bedroom is appointed with a shower cubicle. Three of the balconies are connected to three different bedrooms while the fourth huge balcony is attached to the drawing room. The balconies are aligned brilliantly to offer beautiful and pleasant, wherein three overlook the expanse verdant green and the remaining balcony overlook another tower and the main central garden of the complex. All the balconies are fitted safety grills of standard 3ft height. The bathrooms are elegant with vitrified tiles while the bedroom are cozy with wonderful wooden flooring. The main living room is bright and dazzles with beautiful Italian marble flooring. The flat is completely unfurnished giving the complete freedom for the buyer to customise it according his choice and taste. FacilitiesFew desirable amenities provided by the society include a clubhouse, swimming pool, gymnasium, tennis courts etc. As it is a gated complex, there is adequate security for the flats with additional security at the main entrance. Water supply is 24hours and with 100% power backup, electricity is also uninterrupted. There are two parking spaces available for parking your vehicles, one covered in the basement and one open. LocalityWell-known DPS School is situated near by while Pranavananda International School, RHM PUBLIC SCHOOL, Saraswati High School and J K Memorial Public School, Bhangrola are in the vicinity of 2-3kms. For any kind of medical aid, the famous Rockland Hospital is close by. Happening shopping malls, noted banks, ATMs, super markets, pharmacies and all other recreational avenues are only few minutes drive away from this wonderful residence, making it worth buying.

All the bedrooms are adorned with decorative wardrobes where you can keep your collection of apparels and other valuables.Affixed with premium quality sanitary quality sanitary wares & 3 geyser points for future use, all the bathrooms are designed in western manner where two bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms, while the other is available for common use.Offering unhampered views of the main road and the opposite building, one balcony is connected to the hall, while the other two are adjoined to the 2 respective bedrooms where you can enjoy reading books or have a cup of tea with your loved ones. desc:
Planning to settle in a well-developed residential and commercial hub of Noida?? Opening to view a meticulously designed 2BHK ready to move flat with a super area of 1045 sq ft, up for sale in the one of the most reputed Paramount Floraville, Sector 137, Noida.Property SpecificationsAged less than 5 years, this relatively new flat comfortably positioned on the 15th floor in a high-rise building of 19-floors, thereby benefiting with ample sunlight and fresh air.East facing this flat features 2 well-designed bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 balcony, a dining cum living room, and a kitchen. All the bedrooms are adorned with the decorative wardrobes, 2 double beds, and two ACs to ensure a cool ambiance where you can relax.Equipped with premium quality sanitary fittings and a geyser, both the bathrooms are designed in western fashion, of which one is attached to the bedroom while the other is available for common use. You can enjoy unmatched the view of the Purvanchal Society and the park from the balcony of which one is connected to the generously sized hall, one is adjoined to the kitchen while the other two are en-suite to the bedrooms. The dining cum living room is installed with a TV unit and is also installed with a branded AC for a cool atmosphere where you can enjoy some quality time with your friends and family.Offered with sufficient space for cooking, the well-crafted kitchen is bedecked with a platform, a sink, stove, microwave oven.Further, the entire builder floor is brightened up with the impressive vitrified tiles flooring which reflects the sunlight, does not retain moisture and also has hassle-free maintenance. FacilitiesClubhouse with facilities such as spa, gym, lounge, cafeteria, kids play area, outdoor games, and swimming pool with waterfall are some of the interesting & luxurious amenities which are available for the entire family to enjoy.Some of the elementary facilities such as one reserved covered parking space, round the clock water supply, full power backup for common area, and 24x7 CCTV surveillance for the safety of the residents are also provided.LocalityWith a healthy combination of all the major means of public transports such as buses, taxis, etc, this society has easy access to other parts of the city as the metro station is just opposite to this society, and the local bus stop can be reached within the walkable distance.For all your day-to-day shopping needs, you can visit the shopping mall, supermarket and the local market which are present at 100m range only from where you can fulfill your daily needs easily.You need not commute a long distance to drop your kids to their schools as a fair number of prominent primary schools can be reached within no time. Close by from this society are several esteemed hospitals, clinics, and the nursing homes which offer excellent quality of healthcare services to the residents of Noida.
